original_text: Thou shalt bring down the noise of strangers, as the heat in a dry place; even the heat with the shadow of a cloud: the branch of the terrible ones shall be brought low.
korean_text: 마른 땅에 폭양을 제함 같이 주께서 이방인의 소란을 그치게 하시며 폭양을 구름으로 가림 같이 포학한 자의 노래를 낮추시리이다

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt bring down noise of strangers
as heat in a dry place
even as heat with the shadow of a cloud
The branch of the terrible ones shall be brought low
